attributes.action: prevent immigrants rights of access to britain without the means of self support,as in austrailia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
recentley i had applied to emmigrate to austrailia.but with the recent credit crunch my house is not worth as much as it was.this means i dont have enough money to set up there.
how is it that someone from another country,with no money can come to my country and be given housing, health service and financial aid.bleeding our economy dry?
